docs.snippet: Women in the Lake Chad basin have been forced to sell sex to survive due to an insurgency by Boko Haram fighters that has driven millions from their homes and left children to starve, the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) said on Thu...
docs.lead_paragraph: Women in the Lake Chad basin have been forced to sell sex to survive due to an insurgency by Boko Haram fighters that has driven millions from their homes and left children to starve, the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) said on Thursday.

headline.main: 'Hopeless' Suffering in Lake Chad as Children Starve, Mothers Sell Sex to Survive-Red Cross
headline.print_headline: 'Hopeless' Suffering in Lake Chad as Children Starve, Mothers Sell Sex to Survive-Red Cross

docs.snippet: The family of a California woman who was raped, killed and left in a trash bin has sued the U.S. probation agency — accusing agents of providing lax oversight of two convicted sex offenders who authorities suspect of carrying out that murder...
